response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $12,000. My offer to you is to acquire this product for $10,000. This price reflects my commitment to fair trade while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to discussing how this product could benefit you and potentially closing this deal today.", "product_price": 10000}
